item.title: HUNDI
item.description: January 10, 2024 / 7-8PM: HUNDI For this occasion, you can expect a slower mix full of cerebral vocals, glitchy synths and dubby baselines - keywords are post-human esoteric ritual HUNDI’s selections bite into contemporary futuristic soundscapes full of textured rhythms and harmonious keys, showcasing a variety of genres and a captivating presence. Links: Instagram
